title: MAFS star Telv Williams shares an adorable photo with newborn son
text:
Former Married At First Sight star Telv Williams announced the birth of his third child to Daily Mail Australia last month.

And on Saturday, the 34-year-old worker shared an adorable snap of the newborn, who he shares with former fling Katie Beevers, to Instagram.

The photo, that saw the FIFO worker cradling the baby on his lap, was captioned: 'How did I get so lucky?'

'How did I get so lucky?' Former Married At First Sight star Telv Williams, 34, shared an adorable photo with his third child, baby boy Sage, to Instagram on Saturday

Telv, dressed casually in a khaki T-shirt, shorts and sneakers, beamed for the photo while feeding Sage.

Fans congratulated the tradesman with comments including 'gorgeous photo to cherish' and 'newborn snuggles'.

Speaking to Daily Mail Australia last month, Telv said he's overjoyed at his new addition and that everyone is 'healthy and happy'.

Grateful: 'Couldn't be happier, children are a blessing': Telv announced the birth of Sage to Daily Mail Australia last month. Telv is also pictured with his children Telv Jr and Micah

'I welcomed my son Sage into the world on the 27th of August,' Telv said.

'Couldn't be happier, children are a blessing.'

He added: 'I'm happy, his mum's happy and healthy and my family are happy and that's all that matters.'

So sweet! Telv is pictured feeding the newborn in early September

Telv shares two children with ex-partner Amy Gowers, son Telv Jr and Micah.

In June, the tradesman confirmed he was expecting his third child with ex-fling Katie Beevers.

Taking to Instagram at the time, Telv confirmed reports he was to become a father again, and revealed it's with a former fling he dated for 'a few months' last year.

'For the people asking, YES, I'm having a baby. I was actually dating a girl last year, for a couple of months, a few months, she's not just a random,' he began in a social media video.

Doting father: Telv cradled little Sage in this touching photo from the hospital

'Since knowing her we've actually become pretty good friends,' he explained. 'Our relationship is pretty good at the moment.

'To all the people messaging me asking me if I'm okay, children are a blessing, so I've never been better. I'm going to add to my family, it's fantastic,' he added.

'Things happen in life where you just have to man/woman up and deal with them like an adult.'

Telv also explained while he initially did not want to address the issue publicly 'because it was his business,' he wanted to set the record straight after rumours began circulating.
description: Former Married At First Sight star Telv Williams, 34, shared a sweet photo with his newborn son Sage to Instagram on Saturday.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
